sentences.en: As the domestic market becomes saturated, firms begin to export the product.
sentences.cn: 由于国内市场饱和，各公司开始外销。

sentences.en: At one point last week shares in the grey market touched 230p.
sentences.cn: 上周，灰市上的股票价格一度高达230便士。

sentences.en: Fiction takes up a large slice of the publishing market.
sentences.cn: 小说在出版市场上占了很大的份额。

sentences.en: He must sell the house for the current market value.
sentences.cn: 他必须以目前的市价出售这座房子。

sentences.en: I usually buy all my vegetables at the market.
sentences.cn: 我通常都是在菜市场里购买蔬菜。

sentences.en: If you could ever figure out how to market this you’d make a fortune.
sentences.cn: 如果能想出办法来推销这个东西，你就发财了。

sentences.en: If you could ever figure out how to market this you’d make a fortune..
sentences.cn: 如果能想出办法来推销这个东西，你就发财了。

sentences.en: Many kinds of seasonal flowers are on the market.
sentences.cn: 现货供应多种四季花卉

sentences.en: market stalls/traders
sentences.cn: 集市货摊 / 商贩

sentences.en: Ms Senatorova showed an instinctive feel for market economics.
sentences.cn: 谢纳托罗娃女士对市场经济学有一种天生的敏感。

sentences.en: Our main overseas market is Japan.
sentences.cn: 我们的主要海外市场是日本。

sentences.en: Overproduction and consequent low market prices for wine caused economic tremors.
sentences.cn: 葡萄酒生产过剩及由此造成的市价低迷引起了经济波动。

sentences.en: Pirated copies of music tapes are flooding the market.
sentences.cn: 盗版音乐带正充斥市场。

sentences.en: Pragmatically, MTV's survival depends on selling the youth market to advertisers.
sentences.cn: 从务实角度来说，音乐电视网的生存依赖于把年轻人市场卖给广告商。

sentences.en: She built up her fortune by cannily playing the stock market.
sentences.cn: 她炒股有方，发了大财。

sentences.en: Their ultimate aim was a market economy for Hungary.
sentences.cn: 他们最终的目标是为匈牙利建立起市场经济体制。

sentences.en: There is a plentiful supply of arms on the black market.
sentences.cn: 黑市上有大量武器出售。

sentences.en: There were reports that three companies were negotiating to market the drug.
sentences.cn: 有报道说，有3家公司在洽谈这种药的市场推广。

sentences.en: There’s a good antiques market here on Sundays.
sentences.cn: 每逢周日这里都会有一个不错的古玩集市。

sentences.en: They learnt a lot from the initial market testing exercise.
sentences.cn: 他们从最初的市场测试中了解了许多信息。

sentences.en: They plan to market the toy for children aged 2 to 6.
sentences.cn: 他们打算向二至六岁的儿童推销这种玩具。

sentences.en: They put the family business on the market.
sentences.cn: 他们出售家中的产业

sentences.en: Thousands and thousands of start-up firms have poured into the computer market.
sentences.cn: 成千上万家新成立的公司已涌进了计算机市场。

sentences.en: We are becoming one of the market leaders in the fashion industry.
sentences.cn: 我们正在成为时装业的领军者之一。

sentences.en: We are in the market for a used car.
sentences.cn: 我们想买辆二手车

words.tran_cn: 市场的；可销售的；有销路的
[贸易] 市场商人；市场营销人员
出售；在市场上进行交易；使…上市（market的ing形式）

phrases.tran_cn: (财政)（对某类股票或其他资产）积极地买卖
市场机制；市场调节作用
地产市场；房地产市场；物业市场
房地产市场；不动产市场
股票市场；证券市场；股票交易

trans.tran_cn: 集市，市场，交易，行销地，购买的人数，市场经营者，市场总额
trans.tran_en: a particular country or area where a company sells its goods or where a particular type of goods is sold
to make a product available in shops
to try to persuade people to buy a product by advertising it in a particular way, using attractive packages etc
